name: Doomsday
description:
Play as an intergalactic pathfinder whose spaceship was caught in a gravitational field of a nearby magmatic planet.
Survive as long as possible on this hostile alien planet, dodging the neverending flaming fireballs from space and a scorching hot lava field that is slowly engulfing the world.

Race against time and compete against yourself to become the most resilient astronaut.
